donate_helps_1:
You can purchase Zero Coins in automatically donate system
on official page MTA Project Zero:
donate_helps_2:
All process is automatically. You will receive activation
code in few minutes to E-Mail specified on donate page.
donate_item_kit_build_desc:
This set includes:
15 packs of nails, Hammer, Saw, Axe
donate_item_kit_upper_desc:
This set includes:
25 sheets of metal,
20 sheets of rusted metal
donate_item_kit_military_desc:
This set includes:
GPS, Desert Eagle 36 пт., HK416 240 cr.,
AK74-M 240 cr., Armour, Helmet, Hazer Backpack
donate_item_kit_buildpak_desc:
This set includes:
3 foundation
3 roof
7 walls
1 wall with a doorway
1 door
donate_item_kit_nails_desc:
This set includes:
50 packs of nails
donate_item_expbuild_desc:
This service expands territory of construction
point, adds ability to store two vehicles, and
extend inactive base time to 14 days
donate_item_rembuild_desc:
This service completely removes objects
points of construction
donate_item_spawner_desc:
This service gives you the ability to set
a permanent spawn at any point on map
donate_item_vehicle_desc:
This service allows you to buy a personal
transport, which in the future it will
be possible to open and close
